author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
COSMIC has had a bit of a memory use issue for quite a while now and it turns out that a big part of that may not have been COSMIC's fault but actually a GLIBC Malloc bug.

COSMI
title: COSMIC Blames 20 Year Old GLIBC Bug For Memory Usage
